reporting-org.narrative: Ministerstvo zahraničných vecí a európskych záležitostí SR
Ministry of Foreign and European Affairs of the Slovak Republic

title.narrative: Development of secondary and tertiary health care in field of Gastroenterology in Afghanistan
Rozvoj sekundárnej a terciárnej zdravotnej starostlivosti v oblasti gastroenterológie v Afganistane

description.narrative:
By implementing this project the specialized medical treatment in the field of Gastroenterology and Ultrasound to all patients in Kabul and Takhar province will be established.

Within the project, a new building in Wazir Akbar Khan hospital in Kabul will be constructed, which will serve such as Gastroenterological and Imaging Centre. Part of the planned complex will be also Echocardiography and Doppler blood vessels. New diagnostic methods will complete the services of Gastroenterological Centre which has been established in this hospital in 2008 within a project funded by Slovakaid. Training of Afghan four doctors focused on internal medicine is a part of the project.

In the province of Takhar will be established the same Gastroenterological Centre like in the capital city of Kabul with aim of providing quality treatment to another provinces, as well. Both centers will have mutual cooperation and at the same time will be serving as training centers with the aim of educating further doctor capacities.

Zámerom projektu je zlepšenie dostupnosti kvalitnej diagnostiky a liečby pacientov v odbore gastroenterológia a zároveň chceme prispieť k rozvoju odborných zdravotných služieb, rozvoju odborných lekárskych kapacít a skvalitneniu života afgánskych obyvateľov.

V rámci projektu sa vybuduje nové diagnostické centrum v Kábule a gastroenterologické centrum v štátnej nemocnici Taloqan v provincii Takhar, dodá sa potrebné prístrojové vybavenie a vyškolí sa odborný lekársky personál vrátane ženských lekárok.
